name: Onchain Machine Learning: Building the Intelligence of Autonomous Systems
description: Introducing machine learning into Autonomous Worlds is a key element in enabling us to build complex, intelligent systems. In this talk, weâ€™ll use the example of Tic Tac Toe to discuss how to create a verifiable game AI agent, reviewing the challenges and solutions for implementing ML in blockchain environments.

speakers.name: Ege Atesalp
speakers.bio: Ege Atesalp is a data scientist and researcher working on verifiable machine learning at Giza.
